description.db:para: This table is used by the NAT Helper module to store definitions of socket(s) used to connect to (a set) RTPProxy. More information can be found at: &OPENSIPS_MOD_DOC;nathelper.html.

column.name: rtpproxy_sock
column.description: A list of sockets use to connect to a set of RTPProxy. Example: "udp:localhost:12221 udp:localhost:12222".

column.name: set_id
column.description: The ID of the RTPProxy set.
